title: "Arbeitsjournal Nikola Hadzic"
format: html

---

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
 
library(httr)
library(knitr)
library(readr)

token <- "9349A933594825068992F7D052B4EE30"
url <- "https://fxdbk.usb.ch/api/"
 
formData <- list(
    "token" = token,
    content = 'report',
    format = 'csv',
    report_id = '225',
    csvDelimiter = ',',
    rawOrLabel = 'label',
    rawOrLabelHeaders = 'raw',
    exportCheckboxLabel = 'true',
    returnFormat = 'csv'
)
response <- POST(url, body = formData, encode = "form")

content_type <- headers(response)$`content-type`
data <- content(response, type = "text")


df <- read_csv(data)

kable(df, caption = "© Arbeitsjournal Nikola Hadzic")
```
